description: Now Kandahar in Afghanistan, Alexandria/Alexandropolis/Cufis is an ancient site founded by Alexander the Great ca. 330 BC. The indigenous people of the Hellenistic period were likely the Pakthas.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Kandahar AFG

history.comment: @thomase added references provided by the World Historical Gazetteer via a dataset derived from An Historical Atlas of Central Asia by Yuri Bregel (https://doi.org/10.60681/whg-dataset-838)
